app.title: Audio Converter
app.description: Convert audio online with a clean, fast UI.

header.title: Free Online Audio Converter - Convert MP3 WAV FLAC AAC Fast
header.subtitle: Convert audio files instantly in your browser - no uploads, completely private, 300x faster than FFmpeg. Support MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, OGG formats with batch processing.

features.batchDesc: Convert multiple MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC files simultaneously. Professional batch audio converter saves time and processes dozens of files at once.
features.privacyDesc: Complete privacy guarantee - all audio conversion happens locally in your browser. Your files never leave your device, no servers, no tracking.
features.speedDesc: Revolutionary lightweight audio converter - 300x faster than FFmpeg WASM. Instant conversion using optimized Web Audio API and lamejs encoder.

converter.dragDrop: Drag and drop your audio file here, or click to browse

privacy.localProcessing: All processing happens in your browser. No files are uploaded to any server.

footer.tagline: ¬© 2024 Audio Converter ‚Äî Simple, private, and fast.
footer.openSource: Open source and privacy-focused audio converter
